entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
